sentences.en: Annie was playing happily with her toys .
sentences.cn: 安妮正高兴地玩着玩具。

sentences.en: He grew curious about how to make a toy.
sentences.cn: 他对怎样制作玩具感到好奇.

sentences.en: Jason's new toy train is his pride and joy.
sentences.cn: 简森新买的玩具火车是他得意的东西.

sentences.en: The head joins on the rest of the toy with wire.
sentences.cn: 这玩具的头和身子是用铁丝连在一起的.

sentences.en: The instructions for assembling the toy are very clear.
sentences.cn: 如何装配玩具的说明非常清楚明了.

sentences.en: The little girl slapped the toy down and ran out crying.
sentences.cn: 小女孩啪地一声把玩具扔下就哭着跑了出去.

sentences.en: The little girl wanted to take this toy home.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩想把这玩具带回家.

sentences.en: The shop usually employs additional salespeople for the Christmas toy trade.
sentences.cn: 这家商店通常雇一些临时售货员来做圣诞节玩具生意.

sentences.en: The wheels of the toy car were fixed on metal rods.
sentences.cn: 玩具车的轮子固定在金属棒上.

sentences.en: They churn out 3 000 identical toy trains every day.
sentences.cn: 他们每天生产3000辆一式一样的玩具火车.

sentences.en: This toy can be taken apart and put together with ease.
sentences.cn: 这个玩具可容易地拆开再装起来.

sentences.en: Toy manufacturers began promoting some of their products on television.
sentences.cn: 玩具制造商开始在电视上推销他们的一些产品。

sentences.en: Toy sales peaked just before Christmas and are now decreasing.
sentences.cn: 玩具销售额在圣诞节前夕达到最高峰,现已逐渐下降.

sentences.en: Toy shops do a roaring trade just before Christmas.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节前玩具商店生意火爆.

sentences.en: We rap the manufacturers on their knuckles if the toy is shoddy.
sentences.cn: 如果玩具质量低劣，我们会痛斥制造商。

sentences.en: You can fix the toy plane's tail with this glue.
sentences.cn: 你可以用这种胶水将玩具飞机的机尾粘住.

words.tran_cn: 玩弄；调情；随随便便地对待

phrases.tran_cn: 心不在焉地（或紧张地）摆弄

trans.tran_cn: 玩具的，作玩具的，个头很小的，小体型品种的
玩具，玩物，小装饰品，无实用价值的东西
trans.tran_en: an object for children to play with
an object for children to play with

trans.tran_cn: 玩弄；调情；随随便便地对待
